weather.question: I fall from the sky and make everything wet. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You need an umbrella when I'm around.

weather.question: I am big and yellow and shine in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🔆 I give you light and warmth.
😎 You wear sunglasses when I'm very bright.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy and float in the sky. What am I?
I am cold and white and fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ You can make snowballs with me.
☃️ I cover the ground in winter.
🧤 You need gloves to play with me.

weather.question: I make the leaves swirl and the trees dance. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can be gentle or strong.

weather.question: I am colorful and appear after it rains when the sun is shining. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I need the sun and the rain.
✨ I am a beautiful arc in the sky.

weather.question: I am very, very hot and you see me flash in a storm. What am I?

hints.text: ⚠️ Be careful of me during a storm!

weather.question: I am loud and rumble after you see a flash in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 😴 Some people get scared of me, but I'm just weather!

weather.question: Sometimes the rain freezes when it falls. I am small balls of ice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 Ouch! I can hurt a little if I hit you.
⚽ I'm smaller than a baseball most of the time.

weather.question: I can be really hot and dry, and sometimes I make it hard to see. What am I?

hints.text: 🏜️ I happen a lot in the desert!
🔥 It can be dangerous to be outside during me.
💧 You need to drink lots of water.

cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I come out at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🌃 You can see many of me far away.
🔦 I'm not as big as the sun!

cosmos.question: I am big and hot and give light to the Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I come out during the day.

cosmos.question: I am round and go around the sun. You live on me! What am I?
I am white and round, and I come out at night. Sometimes I'm a crescent shape! What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 I'm not made of cheese, even though I look like it sometimes!
🌚 I shine at night but I don't have my own light.

cosmos.question: I'm a very big ball of gas far away, even bigger than Earth! What am I?

hints.text: 🪐 I'm round like the Earth, but much bigger.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture. What am I?

hints.text: 🖼️ I look like a drawing in the sky.
ursa 🐻 is part of my name sometimes.

cosmos.question: I’m a hot ball of gas, but not as big as the Sun, and you can see many of me at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 I am part of a galaxy.

cosmos.question: Sometimes, a small rock falls to Earth from space. What is it called?

hints.text: 💥 I sometimes burn up in the sky!

cosmos.question: I am the path that the Earth takes around the sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🔄 The Earth takes a very long trip on me
📅 It takes one year to complete my journey.

cosmos.question: I am a big collection of stars, gas, and dust held together. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 The Milky Way is one of me.
